sentences: Apache emerged from New Jersey in the late 1980s as a front man for the Flavor Unit, a hip-hop group.
He first appeared on the Flavor Unit album, The 45 King Presents The Flavor Unit, in 1990.
Apache signed with Tommy Boy/Warner Bros. Records and released his debut album, Apache Ain't Shit (1993), which peaked at number 69 on the Billboard 200 and No. 15 on the Top R&B/Hip-Hop Albums.
Apache released the single "Do Fa Self" in 1993.
According to fellow Flavor Unit members Ali Ba-Ski and Lakim Shabazz, the cause of death was heart failure after years of excessive eating, smoking and drinking.
